doc.field: - Security Pacific Corp's Security Pacific Merchant Bank said acting as lead manager it has offered 270 mln dlrs in 30-year and 35 mln dlrs in 15-year mortgage pass-through certificates. The offering is the second this year under an 800-mln-dlr shelf registration. The first was for 310 mln dlrs. The mortgages were originated by Security Pacific in California. The offering is co-managed by Kidder, Peabody and Co and Shearson Lehman Brothers.
